body_html:
Thanx for pointing out @mkalininait 🙏

Yes, I think we should definitely fix the access rights to conferences/new - by using the appropriate cancancancheck in the controller @juuh42dias ✌️
You could do this in a separate PR though to not change the topic here too much.

I'll quickly create a ticket for this @juuh42dias ☝️

body:
Thanx for pointing out @mkalininait 🙏 

Yes, I think we should definitely fix the access rights to `conferences/new` - by using the appropriate `cancancan`check in the controller @juuh42dias ✌️ 
You could do this in a separate PR though to not change the topic here too much.

I'll quickly create a ticket for this @juuh42dias ☝️
